node.name: Functional
node.rich_text:
Modifica impianto Georgia Pacific di Portland (USA), solo magazzino, non c'è produzione, riceve dei pallet da chiatte • lgv manager • SDM legacy
Esistono due commesse precedenti • CC1361: RG1 Warehouse • 15 Lgv CB25 • FG from Inbound to Warehouse • FG from Warehouse to Staging Lane • EPS from Inbounds to Warehouse • EPS from Warehouse to Outbound conveyor • CC1527: RG2 Warehouse • 13 Fork CB16 LGV’s for Finished Good handling • Transfer of RG1 Finished Goods (FG) from interface conveyor with existing E80 CB25 LGV’s to the warehouse. • Transfer of manually palletized RG1 FG from interface conveyor to the warehouse. • Transfer of other facility inbound product from an interface conveyor to the warehouse. • Transfer of FG from interface conveyors to the Shipping Pre • Transfer of FG from warehouse to shipping staging area.
4 single double fork LGVs: These LGVs will handle finished goods and barge boards •

layout change: • Nuovo conveyor per inbound pallet di FG da RG1 a RG2, rimossi block storage per fargli posto • PCZZI • Rimuovere block storage X da 1 a 17 • BS X 18 e 19 no stack • BS V 1 • BS U 1
>Modifiche Block storage
